summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.6°C) and outside temperature (down 6.7°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13513 lux) and cloud levels (up 615 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15191 lux) and cloud levels (up 1565 m) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 614.7m lower than yesterday, 563.7m lower than the past week, 1565.4m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1109.6m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1673.3m and 2680m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Chance of light rain, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and it’s dim outside. Weather could become unsettled.
